item.description: There’ll be general dancing, a short professional show, a group activity, and also a special introductory lesson.  Attendees will receive a special offer of 3 lessons for only $10.  There is no charge to attend.  Call studio to reserve, 860-788-7150.  Directions to 19 Tuttle Place:  I-91 to Exit 19 Cromwell, left onto Rt. 3S Shunpike Road becomes Newfield Street, right onto Tuttle Road, Tuttle Place is a office park on left just over town border.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Open House Dance Party
